00039 /* 7-bit 2-wire device address                                                                              */
00040 #define WM8978_ID                       (0x1A)
00041 
00042 /* Register Definitions                                                                                     */
00043 #define REG_SOFTWARE_RESET              ((u16)0)
00044 #define REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT1           ((u16)(1 << 9))
00045 #define REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT2           ((u16)(2 << 9))
00046 #define REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT3           ((u16)(3 << 9))
00047 #define REG_AUDIO_INTERFACE             ((u16)(4 << 9))
00048 #define REG_COMPANDING                  ((u16)(5 << 9))
00049 #define REG_CLOCK_GEN                   ((u16)(6 << 9))
00050 #define REG_ADDITIONAL                  ((u16)(7 << 9))

00053 #define REG_DAC                         ((u16)(10 << 9))
00054 #define REG_LEFT_DAC_VOL                ((u16)(11 << 9))

00056 #define REG_JACK_DETECT2                ((u16)(13 << 9))
00057 #define REG_ADC                         ((u16)(14 << 9))
00058 #define REG_LEFT_ADC_VOL                ((u16)(15 << 9))
00059 #define REG_RIGHT_ADC_VOL               ((u16)(16 << 9))
00060 #define REG_EQ1                         ((u16)(18 << 9))
00061 #define REG_EQ2                         ((u16)(19 << 9))
00062 #define REG_EQ3                         ((u16)(20 << 9))
00063 #define REG_EQ4                         ((u16)(21 << 9))
00064 #define REG_EQ5                         ((u16)(22 << 9))
00065 #define REG_DAC_LIMITER1                ((u16)(24 << 9))
00066 #define REG_DAC_LIMITER2                ((u16)(25 << 9))
00067 #define REG_NOTCH_FILTER1               ((u16)(27 << 9))

00096 // R01 REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT1
00097 #define BUFDCOPEN                       (1 << 8)
00098 #define OUT4MIXEN                       (1 << 7)
00099 #define OUT3MIXEN                       (1 << 6)
00100 #define PLLEN                           (1 << 5)
00101 #define MICBEN                          (1 << 4)
00102 #define BIASEN                          (1 << 3)
00103 #define BUFIOEN                         (1 << 2)
00104 #define VMIDSEL_OFF                     (0)
00105 #define VMIDSEL_75K                     (1)
00106 #define VMIDSEL_300K                    (2)
00107 #define VMIDSEL_5K                      (3)
00108 
00109 // R02 REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT2
00110 #define ROUT1EN                         (1 << 8)
00111 #define LOUT1EN                         (1 << 7)
00112 #define SLEEP                           (1 << 6)
00113 #define BOOSTENR                        (1 << 5)
00114 #define BOOSTENL                        (1 << 4)
00115 #define INPPGAENR                       (1 << 3)
00116 #define INPPGAENL                       (1 << 2)
00117 #define ADCENR                          (1 << 1)
00118 #define ADCENL                          (1)
00119 
00120 // R03 REG_POWER_MANAGEMENT3
00121 #define OUT4EN                          (1 << 8)
00122 #define OUT3EN                          (1 << 7)
00123 #define LOUT2EN                         (1 << 6)
00124 #define ROUT2EN                         (1 << 5)
00125 #define RMIXEN                          (1 << 3)
00126 #define LMIXEN                          (1 << 2)
00127 #define DACENR                          (1 << 1)
00128 #define DACENL                          (1)

00130 // R04 REG_AUDIO_INTERFACE
00131 #define BCP_NORMAL                      (0)
00132 #define BCP_INVERTED                    (1 << 8)
00133 #define LRP_NORMAL                      (0)
00134 #define LRP_INVERTED                    (1 << 7)
00135 #define WL_16BITS                       (0)
00136 #define WL_20BITS                       (1 << 5)
00137 #define WL_24BITS                       (2 << 5)        // Default value
00138 #define WL_32BITS                       (3 << 5)
00139 #define FMT_RIGHT_JUSTIFIED             (0)
00140 #define FMT_LEFT_JUSTIFIED              (1 << 3)
00141 #define FMT_I2S                         (2 << 3)        // Default value
00142 #define FMT_PCM                         (3 << 3)
00143 #define DACLRSWAP                       (1 << 2)
00144 #define ADCLRSWAP                       (1 << 1)
00145 #define MONO                            (1)
00146 
00147 // R05 REG_COMPANDING
00148 #define WL8                             (1 << 5)
00149 #define DAC_COMP_OFF                    (0)             // Default value
00150 #define DAC_COMP_ULAW                   (2 << 3)
00151 #define DAC_COMP_ALAW                   (3 << 3)
00152 #define ADC_COMP_OFF                    (0)             // Default value
00153 #define ADC_COMP_ULAW                   (2 << 1)
00154 #define ADC_COMP_ALAW                   (3 << 1)
00155 #define LOOPBACK                        (1)

00160 #define MCLK_DIV1                       (0)
00161 #define MCLK_DIV1_5                     (1 << 5)
00162 #define MCLK_DIV2                       (2 << 5)        // Default value
00163 #define MCLK_DIV3                       (3 << 5)
00164 #define MCLK_DIV4                       (4 << 5)
00165 #define MCLK_DIV6                       (5 << 5)
00166 #define MCLK_DIV8                       (6 << 5)
00167 #define MCLK_DIV12                      (7 << 5)
00168 #define BCLK_DIV1                       (0)             // Default value
00169 #define BCLK_DIV2                       (1 << 2)
00170 #define BCLK_DIV4                       (2 << 2)
00171 #define BCLK_DIV8                       (3 << 2)
00172 #define BCLK_DIV16                      (4 << 2)
00173 #define BCLK_DIV32                      (5 << 2)
00174 #define MS                              (1)
00175 
00176 // R07 REG_ADDITIONAL
00177 #define SR_48KHZ                        (0)             // Default value
00178 #define SR_32KHZ                        (1 << 1)
00179 #define SR_24KHZ                        (2 << 1)
00180 #define SR_16KHZ                        (3 << 1)
00181 #define SR_12KHZ                        (4 << 1)
00182 #define SR_8KHZ                         (5 << 1)
00183 #define SLOWCLKEN                       (1)

00185 // R08 REG_GPIO
00186 #define OPCLK_DIV1                      (0)             // Default value
00187 #define OPCLK_DIV2                      (1 << 4)
00188 #define OPCLK_DIV3                      (2 << 4)
00189 #define OPCLK_DIV4                      (3 << 4)
00190 #define GPIO1POL_NONINVERTED            (0)             // Default value
00191 #define GPIO1POL_INVERTED               (1 << 3)
00192 #define GPIO1SEL_INPUT                  (0)             // Default value
00193 #define GPIO1SEL_TEMP_OK                (2)
00194 #define GPIO1SEL_AMUTE_ACTIVE           (3)
00195 #define GPIO1SEL_PLL_CLK_OP             (4)
00196 #define GPIO1SEL_PLL_LOCK               (5)
00197 #define GPIO1SEL_LOGIC0                 (6)

00487 #define DEPTH3D_86_67                   (13)
00488 #define DEPTH3D_93_33                   (14)
00489 #define DEPTH3D_100                     (15)
00490 
00491 // R43 REG_BEEP
00492 #define MUTERPGA2INV                    (1 << 5)
00493 #define INVROUT2                        (1 << 4)
00494 #define BEEPVOL_POS                     (1)
00495 #define BEEPVOL_MASK                    (7)
00496 #define BEEPVOL_N15DB                   (0)
00497 #define BEEPVOL_N12DB                   (1 << 1)
00498 #define BEEPVOL_N9DB                    (2 << 1)
00499 #define BEEPVOL_N6DB                    (3 << 1)
00500 #define BEEPVOL_N3DB                    (4 << 1)
00501 #define BEEPVOL_0DB                     (5 << 1)
00502 #define BEEPVOL_3DB                     (6 << 1)
00503 #define BEEPVOL_6DB                     (7 << 1)
00504 #define BEEPEN                          (1)
00505 
00506 // R44 REG_INPUT
00507 #define MBVSEL_0_9AVDD                  (0)             // Default value
00508 #define MBVSEL_0_65AVDD                 (1 << 8)
00509 #define R2_2INPVGA                      (1 << 6)
00510 #define RIN2INPVGA                      (1 << 5)        // Default value
00511 #define RIP2INPVGA                      (1 << 4)        // Default value
00512 #define L2_2INPVGA                      (1 << 2)
00513 #define LIN2INPVGA                      (1 << 1)        // Default value
00514 #define LIP2INPVGA                      (1)             // Default value
00515

00518 #define INPPGAZCL                       (1 << 7)
00519 #define INPPGAMUTEL                     (1 << 6)
00520

00523 #define INPPGAMUTER                     (1 << 6)
00524

00527 #define INPPGAVOL_MASK                  (63)
00528

00551

00646 #define VOL_MASK                        (63)

00662 #define RDAC2OUT4                       (1)
